name: photo-of-the-day-july-10-2009-feel-good-friday
title: Photo Of The Day: July 10, 2009 [Feel Good Friday]
author: Christy Frink
excerpt: Schmidt's Guenon, Nashville Zoo. Photo by rbglasson. Photo Of The Day will be a recurring feature for Nashvillest as long you keep giving us stuff to post.
contentEncoded:
Schmidt’s Guenon, Nashville Zoo. Photo by rbglasson.

Photo Of The Day will be a recurring feature for Nashvillest as long you keep giving us stuff to post. Don’t worry–we’ll give you props. Just add them to the pool or tag them with “Nashvillest” if you’re feeling lazy.
